snippet: A government spokesman said that the United States should show more appreciation to Yemen’s embattled president for his assistance in finding Anwar al-Awlaki.
lead_paragraph: A government spokesman said that the United States should show more appreciation to Yemen’s embattled president for his assistance in finding Anwar al-Awlaki.

headline.main: Yemen Notes Its Own Role in U.S. Attack on Militant
headline.print_headline: Yemen Notes Its Own Role In U.S. Attack On Militant
headline.seo: Yemen Notes Its Own Role in U.S. Attack on Militant
